name: inference
author: James Smith
description: A dispatcher in a similar vein to Redux.

scripts.build-js: npm run clean && npm run babel && npm run browserify
scripts.build-js-debug: npm run clean && npm run babel-debug && npm run browserify-debug
scripts.watch-js: npm run build-js && chokidar './index.js' './es6/**/*.js' -c 'npm run build-js'
scripts.watch-js-debug: npm run build-js-debug && chokidar './index.js' './es6/**/*.js' -c 'npm run build-js-debug'
scripts.watch-sass: npm run build-sass && chokidar './examples/*.scss' -c 'npm run build-sass'
scripts.watch-sass-debug: npm run build-sass-debug && chokidar './examples/*.scss' -c 'npm run build-sass-debug'
